markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Touched by Dahak](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=131)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Legacy - Age of Ashes" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=270" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 73</row>

</column>

As the manifestation of Dahak was destroyed, a shard of the dragon god’s wrathful nature infused you, resulting in a violent temper, strange apocalyptic dreams, an obsession with dragon hunting, or some other touch of his influence.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Dragon Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854) skill feat.
name: Touched by Dahak

summary_markdown: As the manifestation of Dahak was destroyed, a shard of the dragon god’s wrathful nature infused you, resulting in a violent temper, strange …
text: Touched by Dahak Source Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 73 As the manifestation of Dahak was destroyed, a shard of the dragon god’s wrathful nature infused you, resulting in a violent temper, strange apocalyptic dreams, an obsession with dragon hunting, or some other touch of his influence. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Athletics skill, and the Dragon Lore skill. You gain the Titan Wrestler skill feat.
